Plot: The Little family adopt a charming young mouse named Stuart, but the family cat wants rid of him.
Title: Stuart Little
Writer: E.B. White (book), M. Night Shyamalan (screenplay), Greg Brooker (screenplay)
Actors: Michael J. Fox, Geena Davis, Hugh Laurie, Jonathan Lipnicki
tomatoConsensus: Critics say Stuart Little is charming with kids and adults for its humor and visual effects.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 7 wins & 12 nominations.
